query:
-- إسناد دور "مكتب المشاريع" لأحمد محمد
INSERT INTO user_role_assignments (userId, roleId, assignedBy, createdAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = 'أحمد محمد' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE code = 'projects_office' LIMIT 1),
  1,
  NOW();

-- إسناد دور "فريق ميداني" لخالد عبدالله
INSERT INTO user_role_assignments (userId, roleId, assignedBy, createdAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = 'خالد عبدالله' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE code = 'field_team' LIMIT 1),
  1,
  NOW();

-- إسناد دور "مالية" لفاطمة أحمد
INSERT INTO user_role_assignments (userId, roleId, assignedBy, createdAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = 'فاطمة أحمد' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE code = 'financial' LIMIT 1),
  1,
  NOW();

-- إسناد دور "طالب خدمة" لمحمد سعيد
INSERT INTO user_role_assignments (userId, roleId, assignedBy, createdAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = 'محمد سعيد' LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE code = 'service_requester' LIMIT 1),
  1,
  NOW();

-- عرض النتائج
SELECT 
  u.name AS user_name,
  r.nameAr AS role_name,
  ura.createdAt
FROM user_role_assignments ura
JOIN users u ON ura.userId = u.id
JOIN roles r ON ura.roleId = r.id
ORDER BY ura.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
